授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to improve upon their current speaking and listening skills according to individual abilities.
到達目標:
Students will be able to:

1.    comprehend a variety of spoken dialog.

2.    engage in a wide variety of speaking situations.

3.    discern between different speaking styles.

4.    prepare a debate on a topical issue.

5.    deliver a public speech by way of researched presentation.
授業方法: This class will be taught in a classroom, face-to-fact format.

トピック.授業計画1: The class will focus on topics in the textbook with additional supplementary materials.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to spend approximately 1 hour for homework each week.
